comments.baddates: dictionary of bad dates and a description for each
comments.hours: dictionary of list of UTC hours to use for TEMPO and TropOMI
comments.regions: List of dictionaries defining regions (labels and location keys)

locations.General: Each key defines an analysis region.
locations.bbox: defines the spatial bounding box [east_lon, south_lat, west_lon, north_lat]
locations.label: The name for this location to be used in figures.
locations.labelxy: The location for the label on a map.
locations.description: description of the location for more information.
locations.airnow,pandora,pandora_hcho,tropomi: Defines whether to perform these types of analyses.
locations.Tuscan Buttes: removed Tuscan Buttes because it is too small for this analysis

baddates.2020-01-01: Data dropouts (10-18 10-19 10-20 10-21 10-30 11-09) are not flagged here
